item.title: [317]Delta/Devo Spec Bar Issue[317]
item.dc:creator: @Danielplanto Danielplanto
item.description:
@Danielplanto wrote:

Ok, so I have created a special for my VLS and Stat WH. This is what i added, yes, i know, it might not even work, but its not the SPECIAL im worried about, its the SPECIAL BAR is not showing up.

Under Client.java

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9814 && specialAmount > 74){ specialAmount -= 75; hitDiff=hitDiff*(3/2); sM("You have hit 3/2x as hard as you would've!"); usingSpecial = true; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9802 && specialAmount > 74){ specialAmount -= 75; hitDiff=hitDiff*2; sM("You have hit 2x as hard as you would've!"); usingSpecial = true; }

and under the special.java

case 9804: case 9812:
^ Both times. Can you tell me why it won’t show up a special bar?

Read full topic
